name: my-rn-framework
description: React Native Framework for brownfield integration

scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.ts --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:android: react-native bundle --entry-file index.ts --platform android --dev false --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
